timeline.message: Throw error when file doesn't exist

timeline.bodyText: Based on a discussion on another PR, I wonder if this should be case-insensitive? Probably better if not, even if we're slightly inconsistent.
timeline.author: coverbeck

timeline.bodyText: Technically you could have a file with that path based on your condition on line 983 -- if it had a different type. Probably would never happen, but you could say "There are no existing test parameter files...".
timeline.author: coverbeck

timeline.message: Merge branch 'feature/2955/deleteTestParameterFile' of github.com:dockstore/dockstore into feature/2955/deleteTestParameterFile
